user_query: I'm planning a road trip from Massachusetts to California. Can you provide me with the zip codes for the starting point in Belmont, Massachusetts and the destination in Los Angeles, California? Additionally, I need the geolocation details for the IP address 192.168.0.1.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the zip code for Belmont, Massachusetts.
Retrieve the zip code for Los Angeles, California.
Get the geolocation details for the IP address 192.168.0.1.
